channel.title: Joe Pantoliano on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Joe Pantoliano on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Joe Pantoliano May Finally Get HBO, Thanks to ‘The Last of Us’ Creator Craig Mazin: ‘They Never Gave It to Me When I Did The Sopranos!’
item.description: It’s Not TV, so maybe that’s why Joey Pants can’t get his HBO? “The Last of Us” Season 2 guest star Joe Pantoliano had previously told Variety he doesn’t subscribe
